campaigns.name: Roots Across Borders
campaigns.slogan: Discover the stories that bind us
campaigns.concept: A visual journey showcasing the diverse experiences of Indians in America through intimate interviews and powerful storytelling, highlighting their cultural heritage and integration.
campaigns.target_audience: Documentary enthusiasts, culturally curious viewers ages 25-45
campaigns.key_message: Indian Americans contribute richly to the fabric of America while preserving their unique heritage.

campaigns.name: Beyond the Diaspora
campaigns.slogan: More than a story, a shared journey
campaigns.concept: An interactive campaign with social media storytelling and audience participation inviting Indian Americans to share their personal stories, complemented by teaser clips from the documentary.
campaigns.target_audience: Young Indian Americans and multicultural audiences active on social media
campaigns.key_message: Every Indian American story adds a unique thread to the larger tapestry of Americaâ€™s diversity.

campaigns.name: Faces of Fusion
campaigns.concept: A multimedia art and documentary campaign featuring profiles of Indian Americans blending tradition with modern American life, highlighting achievements in art, technology, and community.
campaigns.key_message: Indian Americans are shaping the future by merging heritage and innovation.

campaigns.name: The American Desi Experience
campaigns.concept: A nostalgic and heartfelt campaign focusing on the challenges and triumphs of Indian immigrants across generations in America, emphasizing family, identity, and belonging.
campaigns.target_audience: First and second generation Indian Americans, and families interested in immigrant stories
campaigns.key_message: Celebrating the resilience and identity of Indian Americans making America their home.

campaigns.name: Bridging Worlds
campaigns.concept: An educational and inspiring campaign partnering with schools and cultural institutions to screen the documentary with accompanying discussions about cultural diversity and integration.
campaigns.target_audience: Educators, students, cultural organizations, and community leaders
campaigns.key_message: Understanding the Indian American experience fosters empathy and builds stronger communities.
